Package org.finra.herd.service.activiti

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivitiHelper
    A helper bean that provides useful methods for Activiti classes (e.g.
    ActivitiRuntimeHelper
    A helper for activiti's RuntimeService.
    HerdCommandInvoker
    A custom herd Activiti command invoker that extends the default standard Activiti command invoker so we can handle exceptions being thrown in a custom way.
    HerdDelegateInterceptor
    A custom herd Activiti delegate interceptor that allows us to autowire Spring beans onto Java delegate tasks.
    HerdProcessEngineConfigurator
    Activiti process engine configurator used to update Activiti configuration before the engine is built.
